title: Zero-Day exploits: Navigating the dark web of cyber threats
excerpt: Analyzing the lifecycle of zero-day vulnerabilities and how the CYNET team identifies potential security breaches before they propagate.

title: Neural Networks in Modern Infrastructure
excerpt: Exploring how deep learning is being integrated into metropolitan IT grid management to predict and prevent system failures.

title: Quantum Cryptography: The end of encryption as we know it?

title: Distributed Ledgers in Governmental Logistics
